content.text:
# 9th Golden Horse Awards

The 9th Golden Horse Awards () took place on October 30, 1971 at Zhongshan Hall in Taipei, Taiwan.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%"|
* The Story of Ti Ying

**The Twelve Gold Medallions (runner-up)
| valign="top" width="50%"|
* Guang Hui De Shuang Shi
**Youth Holiday 3 (runner-up)
**All Roads Lead to Freedom (runner-up)
**Boundless Longevity (runner-up)
**Leaps and Bounds (runner-up)
